import React from 'react'; const About = () => { return (

About Me

I’m Utkarsh Gupta, a Master’s student at Duke University’s Fuqua School of Business, pursuing an M.S. in Quantitative Management: Business Analytics with a focus on Risk. I have a background in Computer Science and Engineering, and I’m passionate about turning complex data into actionable insights through the power of analytics, storytelling, and responsible AI.

Education

  • Duke University – M.S. in Quantitative Management: Business Analytics

    Durham, NC | May 2025

    Coursework: AI/ML, Deep Learning, Strategic Decision Analytics, Data Infrastructure, Fraud Analytics, Cybersecurity Risk, Storytelling with Data.

  • SRM Institute of Science and Technology – B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

    Chennai, India | Jun 2024 | GPA: 3.8

    Leadership: Public Relations Head, TEDx Club Co-Lead. Published research on psychological analysis via social media tweets.

); }; export default About;
